sentence.Network_en: The trading day is shortened in observance of the Labor Day holiday.
sentence.Network_cn: 因庆祝劳工节，这个交易日交易时间缩短了。

sentence.Network_en: Observance of the law is a matter of principle for us.
sentence.Network_cn: 守法是我们的一个原则问题。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin observantia, from observant- 'watching, paying attention to', from the verb observare (see observe)

entry.def: The observance of something such as a law or custom is the practice of obeying or following it.

example.ex: Local councils should use their powers to ensure strict observance of laws.
example.tran: 地方政务委员会应当行使权力以保证人们严格遵守法律。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of observing; taking a patient look
2. a formal event performed on a special occasion;
3. the act of noticing or paying attention;

sentences.sentence: "he escaped the notice of the police"

means.word_mean: 4. conformity with law or custom or practice etc.

auth_sentence.content: To do the observance due to sprightly May.
auth_sentence.res_content: To do the observance due to sprightly May.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To do the observance due to sprightly May.

auth_sentence.content: He raised his own children without religious observance.
auth_sentence.res_content: He raised his own children without religious observance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He raised his own children without religious observance.

auth_sentence.content: Forty years later, the annual observance has become a global event.
auth_sentence.res_content: Forty years later, the annual observance has become a global event.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Forty years later, the annual observance has become a global event.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

sentences.en: The speaker advocated a less austere observance of the Sabbath.
sentences.cn: 演讲者倡导放宽安息日的严格规定。
